description: Start of a string of exactly 4 consecutive (but disjoint) pairs of twin primes.
references: Posting to Number Theory List (NMBRTHRY(AT)LISTSERV.NODAK.EDU), Nov. 19 1998.
links: Sebastian Petzelberger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Prime[Select[Range[1000000], Prime[ # + 1] - Prime[ # ] == 2 && Prime[ # + 3] - Prime[ # + 2] == 2 && Prime[ # + 5] - Prime[ # + 4] == 2 && Prime[ # + 7] - Prime[ # + 6] == 2 &]] (* _Tanya Khovanova_, Sep 07 2007 *)
crossrefs: The first term of this sequence is in A087641.
author: Randall Rathbun
